cards.title: Protect your edge
cards.subtitle: Keep your models and execution private while investors follow your results.

cards.title: Flexible performance fees
cards.subtitle: Set a fee structure that suits you while Premier calculates and allocates using high watermark logic.

cards.title: Auto deposits and withdrawals
cards.subtitle: When investors add or withdraw funds, allocations adjust automatically without manual work.

cards.title: Manager alerts and visibility
cards.subtitle: Get alerts on new allocations and view investor lists and performance in one dashboard.

cards.title: Manual and EA strategies
cards.subtitle: Run discretionary or algorithmic strategies while the PAMM system distributes every trade across linked investors.
